overview: On a cold night in April1912, over 1500 people aboard the RMS Titanic lost their lives to the merciless waters of the North Atlantic. More than ninety years after rhe fateful event questions about the ship's destruction still remain.
tagline: Titanic's Final Moments: Missing Pieces has made international headlines announcing their location of two new pieces of the legendary ship at 12,400 ft below the Atlantic, These pieces shed new light on the World's most famous ship wreck.
title: Titanic's Final Moments: Missing Pieces
